name: Tokyo: Another Side
description:
Game Idea

A game in the detective genre about an aspiring detective whose emotional fluctuations affect his perception of the world around him. Within the demo, this is shown by discolouring the world, but other methods were planned to show the progression of the character's world view and emotional state.

The jam's theme is to depict the impact of a person's internal state on the external world and vice versa.

Controls

  • WASD - Move
  • E - Interact
  • C - Crouch
  • Shift - Run
  • Alt+F4 - Quit game
  • Mouse - Lookout

Third Party content

  • Metahumans
  • Grass texture from Megascans
  • Neo City Kit by KITBASH3D
  • Advanced Locomotion System by Legend
  • Ultra Dynamic Sky by Everett Gunther
  • Pack of body bags and corpses by 3d.rina
  • Downtown West Modular Pack by PurePolygons
  • Play.ht for Dialogues
  • Kick animation by RamsterZ
  • Pick-up animation from Mixamo
